25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Aishah: That the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "A house without dates, its inhabitants will be hungry." He said: There are narrations on this topic from Salma the wife of Abu Rafi'. [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Gharib from this route. We do not know of it to be a narration of Hisham bin 'Urwah except through this route. He said: I asked Al-Bukhari about this Hadith and he said: "I do not know of anyone who reported it other than Yahya bin Hassan

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اسْتِحْبَابِ التَّمْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Recommending Dates
